sourcesContent:
import React,{useEffect} from 'react' import './ContactUs.css' import address from '../ContactUsPage/svg/address.svg' import email from '../ContactUsPage/svg/email.svg' import phone from '../ContactUsPage/svg/phone.svg' import AOS from 'aos'; import 'aos/dist/aos.css'; function ContactUs() { useEffect(() => { AOS.init(); }, []); return (

Contact Us

We would love to hear from you! If you have any questions, comments or suggestions, please feel free to get in touch with us using the contact form below. We will do our best to respond to your inquiry as soon as possible. Thank you for visiting our website!

Address

CORPORATE INTERACTION CLUB
Ground Floor, Student Activity Center
IIT Roorkee, Roorkee
Uttarakhand, India - 247667

Email

cig@iitr.ac.in

Phone

Prof. Sai R. Meka(Ass. Dean)

+91 1332 285378

Aman Vishwakarma(Chairperson)

+91 9569802087

) } export default ContactUs
